tool_description: validate email and filter disposal fake email
name: emailvalidator
title: emailvalidator

api_list.name: validate
api_list.description: receive email as request body and  send error if any, otherwise send error:false
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://emailvalidator3.p.rapidapi.com/validate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emailvalidator3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://emailvalidator3.p.rapidapi.com/validate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emailvalidator3.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
